refnamediv.refpurpose: Testing that the target startup monitor correctly identifies targets have started, and sets the Node State Manager's state accordingly.

refsection.title: Target units
refsection.para:
This testing requires the existence of focussed.target, unfocussed.target and lazy.target units.
If they do not exist, they can be created by executing the following:
cp /lib/systemd/system/{graphical,focussed}.target cp /lib/systemd/system/{graphical,unfocussed}.target cp /lib/systemd/system/{graphical,lazy}.target

refsection.title: Test Overview
refsection.para: The following behaviours will be confirmed:

refsection.title: Starting the Node Startup Controller tries to change the Node State

orderedlist.listitem:
Read the DLT log and verify these entries appear:
APID CTID Payload
NSMD NSMC [Applied the node state 2: yes]
NSC- CTRL [Active state of unit "node-startup-controller.service" changed to active]

refsection.title: Starting focussed.target tries to change the node state

orderedlist.listitem:
Read the DLT log and verify these entries appear:
APID CTID Payload
NSC- CTRL [Creating D-Bus proxy for unit "/org/freedesktop/systemd1/unit/focussed_2etarget"]
NSC- CTRL [Active state of unit "focussed.target" changed to active]
NSMD NSMC [Applied the node state 3: no]
NSC- CTRL [Failed to set the node state: error code 2]

refsection.title: Starting unfocussed.target tries to change the node state

orderedlist.listitem:
Read the DLT log and verify these entries appear:
APID CTID Payload
NSC- CTRL [Creating D-Bus proxy for unit "/org/freedesktop/systemd1/unit/unfocussed_2etarget"]
NSC- CTRL [Active state of unit "unfocussed.target" changed to active]
NSMD NSMC [Applied the node state 4: yes]

refsection.title: Starting lazy.target tries to change the node state

orderedlist.listitem:
Read the DLT log and verify these entries appear:
APID CTID Payload
NSC- CTRL [Creating D-Bus proxy for unit "/org/freedesktop/systemd1/unit/lazy_2etarget"]
NSC- CTRL [Active state of unit "lazy.target" changed to active]
NSMD NSMC [Applied the node state 5: no]
NSC- CTRL [Failed to set the node state: error code 2]

refsection.title: Stopping a target unit will not try to change the node state

orderedlist.listitem:
Read the DLT log and verify that these entries appear:
APID CTID Payload
NSC- CTRL [Creating D-Bus proxy for unit "/org/freedesktop/systemd1/unit/focussed_2etarget"]
NSC- CTRL [Active state of unit "focussed.target" changed to inactive]
Verify that these entries do not appear:
APID CTID Payload
NSMD NSMC [Applied the node state 3: yes]
